title: No fences for Baronne: Baronne Champs libres
creator_credit: Jacscam Enterprises and Claude R Camredon
brief_description: This film describes the contrast of freedom and work for the horses in the beautiful and wild region of the Swiss Jura. It also presents exciting, unique events and popular races.
